messages.subject: sympathetic thoughts
messages.msgSnippet: Please send some symphathetic thoughts toward us up here in Minnesota,  I just found out we lost a very liberal Democratic senator near my town in an airplane
messages.messageBody:
Please send some symphathetic thoughts toward us up here in Minnesota, I just found out we lost a very liberal Democratic senator near my town in an airplane crash, his whole family and 3 campaign supporters and 2 pilots died.



Paul Wellstone did some great things in Washington and my heart is so sad that we've lost him.



I'm not much of a political person because I'm too radical for most politicians but Wellstone was a radical for a politician. We are going to miss him in Washington.

Kelli
